comments.html:
Some people realized the network is an asset to their company, others believe it's a sinkhole.

http://blog.ipspace.net/2017/11/the-three-paths-of-enterprise-it.html

The latter also tend to believe in whatever fairy tales are sold through glitzy PPT.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I agree to most of part.

But while the world should have been moved towards Disaggregation & Open Source systems and implementations, In last couple of years the market is rather moving fast into Black Box direction with SD-WAN and DC Fabric Solutions. Also specially the SD-WAN market in particular is in too much of bad shape in terms of information documentation.

Your thoughts.... ?
comments.name: Evil CCIE
